hyperlinks.name: pelicans-win-west-quarterfinals-advance-to-semifinals
hyperlinks.title: Pelicans Win West Quarterfinals
hyperlinks.excerpt: Catch up with all of the In-Season Tournament action

gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 127, Kings 117
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans advance to the IST West Semifinals as they defeat the Kings, 127-117. Brandon Ingram recorded a team-high 30 points, along with 8 rebounds and six assists for the Pelicans, while Herbert Jones added a season-high 23 points in the victory. Domantas Sabonis tallied 26 points, 13 rebounds and 10 assists for the Kings in the losing effort, his 2nd triple-double of the season, and 34th of his career. The Pelicans improve to 12-10 on the season, while the Kings fall to 11-8. The Pelicans will play in the IST West Semifinals game in Las Vegas on Thursday, December 7th at 9:00 p.m. ET on TNT.
